alignCaseWithSwitch.title: Align “case” With ”switch”
alignCaseWithSwitch.description: When enabled, `case` and `default` statements in `switch` blocks will match the indent level of the enclosing `switch` instead of indenting themselves one level.

indentAfterBracelessIf.title: Indent After Braceless “if” And “else”
indentAfterBracelessIf.description: When enabled, `if` and `else` statements without a brace on the initial line will trigger an indent, then a dedent after a single statement. Disable if your brace style is incompatible with this pattern.

addHangingIndentAfterLogicalOperators.title: Add Hanging Indent After Logical Operators
addHangingIndentAfterLogicalOperators.description: When enabled, will add a hanging indent when a line ends with `&&` or `||`, continuing the indent until the end of the statement.

addHangingIndentAfterTernaryOperators.title: Add Hanging Indent After Ternary Operators
addHangingIndentAfterTernaryOperators.description: When enabled, will add a hanging indent when a line ends with `?`, continuing the indent through the ensuing `:` until the end of the statement.
